description: Get all your favourite Thomas Merton quotes in this one handy app! With a huge number of quotes, you will always be able to enjoy new sayings and messages while you're on the go! Thomas Merton Quotes offers a simple and intuitive interface. Simply tap or shake your Palm device and a new phrase is displayed. You can also view all the quotes in a scrollable list. It's great if you're searching for one particular quote. Whichever way you choose to view, you'll be able to easily access a great collection of quotes! If you truly enjoy the words of Thomas Merton, you owe it to yourself to download Thomas Merton Quotes today!
